children.comment: Bull, 10% is a huge friggin' lot. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Daylight#Daylight_intensity_in_different_conditions
The Moon only reflects 10% of the light that hits it, so you'd only get 5% of the UV.
"The moon reflects UV light only half as well as it does visible light." okay, never mind.
Seriously though, does Moon reflect UV?
